reviews.text: We were recommended this hotel at the Munich airport. Large, spacious rooms, with beautiful scenery. We could hear the church bells ring on the Sunday morning we were there. One of the best breakfasts I had, many selections and the best yogurt and chocolate croissaints!
reviews.title: Awesome gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel in jan 2007. Very comfortable and quiet room. Large double bed, sofa nice beathroom. Very well mainteined. Family owned hotel with owner living on premises always checking all is spick and span. Lovely and varied breakfast buffet with fruit, cold meats and cheeses, cooked sausages bacon eggs. Lots of breads , plenty of coffee and selection of teas. Very well recommended. Close to Erding Therme which is the best therme in Germany.
reviews.title: Hotel Henry, would definitely go again.
